name: Propaganda and Rebellion
description:
Created for Brackys game jam #5

You are a warlord in this is a small strategy game. Your goal is to conquer all the territory on the map while causing rebellion in the other players and stopping rebellion in your own territory by sending propaganda leaflets. Can you do it!?

  • WASD to move the camera around
  • Left Click to do stuff

Tried to fit the theme 'Stronger Together' by focusing on the civil war aspect of it. If you let discontent grow in your country then it will have a rebellion, where your manpower and land get split off. So, you must keep your country 'Stronger Together' in order to win.

Music from origionaljun - https://freesound.org/people/orginaljun/sounds/531961/ (I just lowered the pitch)
